name: Santa's Speedy Sleigh Ride!
description:
Help Santa deliver presents all over the world! But watch out for the snowballs, because they're gonna hurt! 

Instructions to run: 

  1. Unzip the folder (right-click the folder, then click "extract all", then click "confirm"). 
  2. Go inside the folder. You should find a file called "ChristmasGame"
  3. Enjoy!
